DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess severity post-operative pain follow use BiZact™ device adult ( ≥22 year age ) tonsillectomy procedure .
DOC.brief_title: A Study BiZact™ Adults Undergoing Tonsillectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : Prospective , multi-center , single-arm non-comparative pilot study assess severity post-operative pain use BiZact™ tonsillectomy . Study Visits : - Screening - Surgery , Day 0 - Post-Op Follow-up Day 1 - Day 7 & Day 10 ( Home assessment ) - Post-Op Follow-up Day 14 ( Office Visit )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults ( male female ) ≥22 year age 2 . Scheduled undergo nonelective tonsillectomy 3 . Signed informed consent subject legally authorize representative 1 . Subjects undergoing : 1 . Elective tonsillectomy 2 . Simultaneous adenoidectomy 3 . Tonsillectomy result cancer 4 . Unilateral tonsillectomy 5 . Current participation clinical trial 2 . Subjects : 1 . Current tobacco use 2 . Known bleed disorder 3 . History peritonsillar abscess 4 . Craniofacial disorder 5 . Down syndrome ( Trisomy 21 ) 6 . Cerebral palsy 7 . Major heart disease ( include limit ; rightsided heart failure , leftsided heart failure , congestive heart failure , coronary artery disease , arrhythmia , chronic heart failure , acute heart failure , etc . ) 8 . Subjects unable comply require study followup visit 9 . Pregnancy 3 . The subject comorbidities , opinion investigator , appropriate study subject estimate life expectancy le 6 month 4 .
